This is a tutorial document for the Tampere Summer school course **Introduction to R** made by the course lecturer [Chien Lu](https://humblelu.github.io/personal_website/). You can find it from the corresponding course  [webpage](https://www.tuni.fi/en/study-with-us/introduction-r-tampere-summer-school).

## Course Logistics

* Leaning outcome: After this course, participants will be able to use R to conduct basic statistical analysis and data visualization
* Assessment: Pass/Fail
* Course Requirement:
    + Deadline: 31.08
    + 6 Exercise packs 
    + Data analysis course work (individual or group)
        + Perform statistical data analysis using R
        + If you don't have your own dataset, come to discuss with me!
    + No exams
